_header: In that time thus befell / A false man began to spell
_description: Simon Magus, a Narratio in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
In þat tyme þus it be fellA fals man be gan to
                    spell…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…To þat ilk blisse he vs bringeþat for oure lufe on
                    rode walde hinge
BodAsh42.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 78-80.
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

CULDd11.First Lines:
A fals prophete þat was Symon cald& seyde he myhte don wht
                    he wald…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…Amen I rede we alle singeffor of þat blisse is non
                    endinge
CULDd11.Note: Variant beginning, following 6087 without a break.

CULGg531.First Lines:
In þat tyme þus by fellA fals man by gan to
                    spell…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Tyll þat blys he bryng vsOure Lord dere swete ihesus
                    Amen

HunHM129.First Lines:
A fals prophete wos Symon caldAnd said he myght do what he
                    wald…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…And to þat same blysfull bywystBrynge vs oure loure
                    ihesu crist
HunHM129.Note:
No heading or other indicator of separate text, so treated as part of
                        5800.
